translation.text:
Frequent buses are replacing trains between Bathurst, Lithgow, and Springwood due to a landslide at Leura and infrastructure damage caused by recent bushfires. Due to the nature of these incidents the line between Mount Victoria and Springwood is expected to remain closed for the remainder of the week.

Due to the extent of the damage caused by the bushfires, buses will continue to replace trains between Mount Victoria and Lithgow for some time. We will continue to keep you informed as these incidents progress; Please listen to announcements, check indicator boards, and monitor Transport apps for updates.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Blacktown earlier.
due to urgent infrastructure repairs caused by weather conditions.
Springwood - This service is replaced by bus between Mount Victoria and Springwood due to a landslide at Leura.
Springwood - This service is replaced by bus between Springwood and Mount Victoria due to a landslide at Leura.

Due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Moss Vale. At this stage there is no alternative transport available. Customers are advised to catch the 8.52 pm service from Moss Vale and the 10.35 pm service from Campbelltown.
The escalator between the Grand concourse and Northern concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 1777.
The lift between George Street and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4110.

Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrades the lifts from George Street to Concourse Level will be closed until July 2020.   During these works, Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.

The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. Customers travelling from the city who require lift access should alight at International Airport station and catch a service from platform 1 back to Domestic Airport station. You can also call 8337 8450 for assistance.

Metro services are terminating and commencing from Macquarie University station due to severe weather conditions earlier. Replacement buses are in operation between Macquarie University and Chatswood. Customers wishing to change for a Metro service should do so at Epping instead of Chatswood.

Croydon, Denistone & Newtown Stations - External power supply issues are affecting platform screens, Opal card readers and station lighting. For Opal information or fare adjustments, please visit transportnsw.info/opal.

The public toilets at Beverly Hills station are currently unavailable while major repairs take place. Temporary toilets have been provided and are located outside the station on Tooronga Terrace. These facilities can be accessed during staffed hours. We apologise for any inconvenience.

Due to a burst water main there is currently no water supply to Redfern station. This means that toilet and sink facilities will be unavailable. Water is not expected to be restored for approximately 6 hours. We appreciate your patience during this disruption.

Due to station maintenance works, the pedestrian ramp between Richmond Platform 2 and the concourse is closed. If you are unable to use the stairs, a shuttle bus to and from East Richmond station will be available.   For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7248.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
